events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the recruitment process.
During the initial screening call, we discussed your previous software developer experience and verified your coding skills.
Thank you for promptly answering our follow-up questions and confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior software engineers for April 18th at 10 AM UTC via video conference.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and clear coding expertise.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for April 22nd at 3 PM UTC to discuss cultural fit and employment terms.
The HR interview went well, covering your motivations, career goals, and compensation expectations clearly and positively.
We have extended a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including details on salary, benefits, and start date.
You have acknowledged receipt of the offer and provided positive feedback regarding the terms and conditions.
Congratulations on accepting the offer! We look forward to having you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun with access to all necessary systems and orientation materials for new software engineers.
The recruitment cycle is now complete. Welcome officially onboard as a full-time Software Engineer in our development team.
